name: Mass Fidelity
tag_list: audio, software, tech, start-up, stereos, smart-sound-systems, streaming-music, content-management
overview:
Mass Fidelity is a Canadian based audio tech start up. In March 2012 Mass Fidelity open sourced stereOS a Linux based operating system designed to inspire a new market segment in consumer audio: Smart Sound Systems.

As a company Mass Fidelity’s R&D efforts are focused on Design, Sound quality, and Content management. As the innovator of Smart Sound Systems Mass Fidelity’s goal is to continuously set new benchmarks in performance and value in the consumer audio space.

Smart Sound Systems are not just about networking your music. They’re about intelligently aggregating all of your music collections and presenting them to you in a friendly way across all the devices you use on a daily basis.
